## Övergripande syfte

> "to evaluate older people’s perceptions of being co-researchers in a mass experiment on accessibility in housing. More specifically, the purpose is to investigate what interest and commitment to participate in research in this way exists in older people, what capacity older people attribute to themselves and show when it comes to performing the tasks included in a mass experiment, and what possible lessons and insights into research and accessibility to which participation in such a mass experiment contributes."


---

## Frågeställningar

- What interest do older people in (southern) Sweden express that they have, when it comes to participating in a mass experiment on accessibility in housing? 
- What capacity do older people in (southern) Sweden attribute to themselves and demonstrate when it comes to performing the tasks included in a mass experiment? 
- What possible lessons and insights about research and accessibility can participation as a co-researcher in a mass experiment on accessibility in housing give older people in (southern) Sweden?

???


med den här studien är såsom det nu är formulerat att...

Men detta syfte är är jag medveten om lite i vagaste laget och behöver preciseras vilket jag hoppas är en av de punkter vi kan diskutera idag.

Denna studie är alltså en form av utvärdering av vad som beskrivs som ett massexperiment om tillgänglighet i svenska bostäder... och då undrar ni kanske bad massexperiment är.
